head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, WILLIAM THOMPSON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, WILLIAM THOMPSON

block.p: KLEIN-William Thompson. Of Locust Valley on May 8, 2000. Age 64. President of the Franklin Co. Contractors Inc., College Point, NY. Beloved husband of Sue, father of William R. (Sarah) and Lynn E. (Simon Capstick-Dale), son of Lenore and the late William H., brother of Laurel K. Sisson and Roger L., grandfather of William G., Katherine W., Elizabeth T., and Charles S. Capstick-Dale. Visiting Funeral Home of Dodge Thomas, 3-5 and 7-9. Service Locust Valley Reformed Church, Friday 2 PM. Donations may be made to North Shore Wildlife Sanctuary, P.O. Box 214, Mill Neck, New York 11765, or Doctors Without Borders.

KLEIN-William Thompson. Of Locust Valley on May 8, 2000. Age 64. President of the Franklin Co. Contractors Inc., College Point, NY. Beloved husband of Sue, father of William R. (Sarah) and Lynn E. (Simon Capstick-Dale), son of Lenore and the late William H., brother of Laurel K. Sisson and Roger L., grandfather of William G., Katherine W., Elizabeth T., and Charles S. Capstick-Dale. Visiting Funeral Home of Dodge Thomas, 3-5 and 7-9. Service Locust Valley Reformed Church, Friday 2 PM. Donations may be made to North Shore Wildlife Sanctuary, P.O. Box 214, Mill Neck, New York 11765, or Doctors Without Borders.
